title: xin E doesn't prock sudden impact ???
body:
xin's E  doesnt give the lithality its supposed to 
Why ?

replies.body:
One thing that throws me off is you have to throw your next auto-attack to get the benefit, IIRC.  So when testing I'd immediately check my stats after dashing and get sad about it being broken.  

Should work though!

If I may ask, why exactly do you have to land a basic attack for the bonus to apply? It seems like a really convoluted and clunky way to make the rune weaker, why couldn't the stats just be toned down a bit if is that much of a problem?
Just looked at it.  It does.
It does prock sudden impact, it just doesn't appear on your buff bar.
